_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: GeyserMC
author: justin@klerk.nl
description:
Enable clients from Minecraft Bedrock Edition to join your Minecraft Java server.

https://geysermc.org/

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Geyser Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk update
apk add curl
cd /mnt/server
if [ -z "${GEYSER_VERSION}" ] || [ "${GEYSER_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
GEYSER_VERSION="lastSuccessfulBuild"
fi
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://ci.nukkitx.com/job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/job/${GYSER_BRANCHES}/${GEYSER_VERSION}/artifact/bootstrap/standalone/target/Geyser.jar

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Geyser Version
variables.description:
Build number for all Branches

(the master build ) https://ci.nukkitx.com/job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/job/master/

variables.name: Geyser Build Branches
variables.description:
Different types of Geyser Branches with different features

(list of all Branches )https://ci.nukkitx.com/job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/
